D.E.N. - Deals Exchange Network


**Deal or NO DEAL** - Get your deals analyzed by a panel of local real estate experts! To be a candidate to submit your deals - email Bernadette (Bernadette@bostonareia.com) today!

Then, Jack Lavoie will present Appraisal Issues and Techniques for Investors

The most important skill an investor can master
How to estimate the After Repaired Value (ARV)
The real cost of pricing your house wrong
How to track and forecast trends in your local market
How to choose your comps and where to find them
Now to analyze apartments and income property
What types of property to RUN away from
Dealing with bank appraisers when you are selling
Retailing your house to an FHA buyer
Finding local rental and vacancy rates
Property analyzing the deal
Cap Rates and Gross Rent Multipliers 101

Jack Lavoie is not only an experienced investor, but a licensed real estate broker, auctioneer and certified appraiser. Jack has taught many courses to local investors and brokers on investing, short sales, creative financing , appraising and more. He has bought and sold 70+ properties himself and assisted other investors acquire hundreds. Jackâ€™s appraisal background makes him a master at analyzing deals and is the appraiser of choice of brokers, attorneys and investors in NH.

Jack currently owns and manages Jack Lavoie Real Estate and ALX Realty Investments, LLC. Next month he will be launching the Manchester (NH) Real Estate Investors Club and will serve as the education director.

WHEN: 1st Tuesday of Every Month 6:30 PM - next DEN 4/6/2010 - Enjoy Networking, Deals, Prizes and Fun!!!
